alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 6:41PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Juab... southwestern Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 640 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Skull Valley to 14 miles northeast of Scipio. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Dugway English Village, Eagle Mountain, Cedar Fort, Vernon, Ophir, Tooele Army Depot, Skull Valley, Elberta, Tooele Army Depot South, West Mountain, Utah Lake, Genola, Eureka, Stockton, Rush Valley, Fairfield, Erda and Tintic Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 80 and 92. US Route 6 between mile markers 128 and 151. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
